titles.title: Captivate My Heart, My Life To Set Apart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Captivate my heart. My life to set apart.
Establish there Your throne.
Let Your will be known.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Reign in me, sovereign Lord, reign in me.(2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Toma mi corazon, mi vida separa,
Establecela en tu trono,
Haz tu voluntad.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Reina en mi, soberano Señor, reina en mi,
Oh Señor, reina en mi.
